subject: Order #SSN4271l
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

I have written many E-Mails and i get No answer.
When will my Pedals arrive i ordered then for over a Month and the Tracking
ist Open since a Month.

Order #SSN4271

I kindly ask ask for an answer!

conversations.body_text: Could you please ASK the shipping company when i will.get my Order?
Hi Steffen Glapa,    We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused! This package may have been lost. We will arrange for a replacement shipment immediately and initiate an investigation.
